explanation: The objects involved in completing the task of placing a glass on a shelf are the glass itself and the shelf. Other objects in the environment such as pan, ladle, dish sponge, wine bottle, spatula, spoon, fork, cup, plate, knife, tomato, bowl, salt shaker, bread, mug, apple, potato, soap bottle, lettuce, pot, pepper shaker, butterknife, egg are not relevant to completing this specific task.
